title: Don’t miss the chance at a secure extra phone line for under $25
content:
Macworld

It’s harder than ever to stay anonymous online, but luckily, the same isn’t true for your phone and text communications. Whether you need another private number for work or to communicate with secondhand sellers, Hushed provides an affordable option.

With a Hushed Private Phone Line, users can have a secure and customized secondary number free of monthly fees. Thanks to a limited-time sale, a lifetime subscription is now only $24.99 (reg. $150).

Setting up a Hushed plan is easy and cheap, and you can even pick your area code from available numbers in the U.S. and Canada. Choose a plan that fits your needs. A basic plan provides users with a combination of 6,000 SMS and 1,000 minutes per year, and you can upgrade as needed. Another bonus? Hushed uses your existing WiFi or data to make calls or texts so that you can say goodbye to additional service charges.

Enjoy access to your Hushed phone line on your primary phone and full anonymity. Users can also manage incoming calls and texts through the Hushed app, enjoy easily customized voicemails, messaging and call forwarding as needed, and more.

Find out why Hushed has a 4.6 out of five-star average rating on the App Store when you grab a lifetime subscription to the Hushed Private Phone Line for just $24.99.
